SELECT OWNERGROUP, COUNT(DEPT) SUMOFWORKITEM, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUS = 'notAssigned' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) NOTASSIGNED, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUS = 'notStart' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) INITSTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUS = 'inProgress' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) RUNNINGSTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUS = 'completed' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) FINISHSTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUS = 'pause' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) PAUSESTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUS = 'cancel' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) CANCEL FROM (SELECT DISTINCT A.OWNERGROUP DEPTGUID, D.ITEMNAME EXECUTESTATUS, A.COMPLETIONRATE, A.MD_ID, A.MD_NAME FROM (SELECT P.* FROM $WORKITEMTABLENAME$ P WHERE P.CREATEUSER = #USERGUID# UNION SELECT P.* FROM $WORKITEMTABLENAME$ P WHERE EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SA_USER A_ INNER JOIN PPM_TASKRESOURCE B_ ON A_.GUID = B_.USERGUID WHERE B_.TASKGUID = P.GUID AND A_.GUID = #USERGUID# ) UNION SELECT P.* FROM $WORKITEMTABLENAME$ P WHERE EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM PPM_PROJECTROLE Y INNER JOIN PPM_ROLEMEMBERS Z ON Y.GUID = Z.PROJECTROLEGUID WHERE P.RELATIONPROJECT = Y.TYPEGUID AND Y.CLASSGUID = #CLASSGUID# AND (UPPER(Y.ROLEID) = 'MANAGERROLE' OR UPPER(Y.ROLEID) = 'RECEIVER') AND Z.USERGUID = #USERGUID# ) ) A LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL D ON A.EXECUTESTATUS = D.GUID WHERE 1=1
) X GROUP BY OWNERGROUP

SELECT OWNERGROUP, COUNT(OWNERGROUP) SUMOFWORKITEM, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUS = 'notAssigned' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) NOTASSIGNED, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUS = 'notStart' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) INITSTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUS = 'inProgress' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) RUNNINGSTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUS = 'completed' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) FINISHSTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUS = 'pause' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) PAUSESTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUS = 'cancel' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) CANCEL FROM (SELECT A.OWNERGROUP, D.ITEMNAME EXECUTESTATUS, A.COMPLETIONRATE, A.MD_ID, A.MD_NAME FROM $WORKITEMTABLENAME$ A LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL D ON A.EXECUTESTATUS = D.GUID WHERE 1=1
) X GROUP BY OWNERGROUP
